lines.text:
[looking at the guarded building]
I gotta find a way in there!
I might know a way in.
I thought you wanted to fight me, defeat me in a match, regain your honor. Killing my wife only shames you forever.

[holding a gun to Vicky's head]
Maybe he's right.
Hello, Mrs. Sloan. I hope that you had a pleasant trip across the border.
Who are you? Why have you brought me here?
Maybe you've heard of me - Tong Po.
I've heard of you. You're the pig that framed my husband!
I am afraid so, however I thought I would make it up to him by taking care of his little wife.

[as Tong Po starts raping her]
Go, Po.
You! Fight or die!
You don't have the guts to fight him yourself.

[shouts]
Kill Sloan! Or you all die!
It's all been a lie. There is no money. You saw what he did to the others. He intends to kill us.
You are surprised to see I have a music talent. Do you play an instrument, my friend?
I'd like to, but I am a little tied up at the moment.
He said you're a hard man. Just how hard are you, Mr. Jones?
Um... hard enough.

[paying David for winning the street fight]
Five centuries ain't gonna get you far in this life. You in the mood for some serious action?
Depends on your definition of serious.

[amused]
What are you, some kind of intellectual or something? I tell you what, Jack, why don't I make a call, see if I can get you into a heavier grind with some serious client?
Do it.
You'll probably have to go to Mexico for the score. Is that a problem, Jack?
Only for the Federales.
Big tournament, but you got to qualify. They like you, they pay my commission, so do me a favor, Jack, huh? Kick some royal ass, okay?
[David picks up his bag and starts to walk away]
Hey, Jack. Jack! Don't you want to know what the payday is?

[still walking away]
Doesn't matter.
A cool million! That sound good to ya?
Yeah, it doesn't sound bad.
But I'm warning you, some don't make it back.

[still walking]
Ah, that's too bad for them.

[helping Laurence up]
You know, you should be more careful...
Fuck you! Keep your opinions to yourself.
You know, a simple 'thank you' would do.
Yeah, okay. Thank you, asshole.
[Smith and Laurence have both won their first round tournament fights]
Did pretty good today. Wanna go dance later on?
Fuck you!
You'll walk when I tell you to walk! Hello, men. Come on! Come on! You see this? This is home - ha-ha! Let's go! Let's go, pronto! Come on, baby!

[last words before having his neck broken]
Let me tell you something, huh? Listen to me, huh? Only MEN got balls, you stupid bitch!
You're Andrew Smith's punk kid brother?
Yeah.
I don't remember there being much hope for you.
Andrew straightened my ass out. Said you got fucked over and ended up doin' some time.
That's history.
Wait'll everybody finds out that Sensei Sloan is here. There'll be the sound of a hundred bricks shitting at the same time.
She's my friend. I have to save her.
How can I trust you?
Who else do you have?
